plots.content:
This plot is the second of a series of 7 plots that reveal "Plottable Circles" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.

This second fountain pen plot shows that getting only one shape is a possibility, and diverges away from being a circle! It also highlights the new compression mechanism implemented to allow a wide range of amplitude on the lines without hurting the paper. My previous exploration was creating a problem as it was crossing the lines, I've made it bounces to avoid this issue.

data.title: Circles (Reveal 2 / 7)

plots.content:
This plot is the first of a series of 7 plots that reveal "Plottable Circles" – my next plottable generative art on fx(hash) platform.

This first plot reveals that my incoming generator is indeed going to be a reboot of https://greweb.me/plots/313 recent exploration. More properties will be revealed in the 6 next plots!
